column1: The Lexington Traffic Management Center will be closed on Monday January 18 in observance of Dr Martin Luther King Jr Day.
Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday January 19 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Street Closures Scheduled for the Freedom March:
column4: Monday January 18 from 10:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m.

column3: Street Closures Scheduled for the Freedom March:
column4: Route:  W High St in front of Rupp Arena -> Broadway -> Vine -> Rose -> Main -> Broadway -> return to starting point.

column3: Street Closures Scheduled for the Freedom March:
column4: Broadway will be closed between W Maxwell St and W Short St at 9:45 a.m., and again prior to the March returning to the starting point.

column3: Street Closures Scheduled for the Freedom March:
column4: Rolling street closures as the March progresses, along with complete closures on other streets as needed.
